name: Cowboy Tennis
description:
Made by:
Espen Haftorn Gonzalez
Joe Even Maribo Bråtane
Edvin Gammelsæter
Josefine Alvestad
Carlos Maldonado Aguilera
Jenny Cha Alfsen

Controls: 
MUST BE PLAYED WITH CONTROLLERS
Left stick to move, A to shoot

Description:
The ultimate fight of the century! Cowboy VS Tennis! Battle your rival to the death, but be sure not to fall down yourself!

Made during Valmuen Game Jam November 2019, where the theme was "Shooting gallery"
